text: 2.14 Ais 9.6, Mai 5.5, Jon 16.33, Apo 10.36, 1 Ko 12.13, Kol 1.20, 2.14 Klays ne ke chɨnop gek, binɨb okok kɨlop jɨmñɨl mɨdɨl mɨdtep gɨpun. Ned ñɨn ak, Juda binɨb okok, binɨb Juda mel okok mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd penpen gelɨgɨpal. Mɨlɨk nɨgep anɨb ak wali tek yek, kɨli tɨg asɨk keke yelɨgɨpal. Klays pen kumak tek nɨŋɨd, wali ak tɨb walɨg yokɨl, Juda binɨb okok ayɨp binɨb Juda mel okok ayɨp dɨ jɨmñɨl lek, binɨb nokom olap mɨdebal.
